title.value: Basically the same thing as a normal HTML signin, but with special styling.

description.value: signins can display a label, an icon, or both. A label should always be specified (through innerHTML) or the label attribute. It can be hidden via showLabel=false.

examples.value:
<signin data-dojo-type="weblab/widget/signin/signin" onClick="...">Hello world</signin>
var signin1 = new signin({label: "hello world", onClick: foo});
dojo.body().appendChild(signin1.domNode);
